export var CategoryActionTypes={GET_LIST:"GET_LIST",GET_LIST_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_ERROR:"GET_LIST_ERROR",GET_ACCESSORY:"GET_ACCESSORY",GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS:"GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS",GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR:"GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR",GET_LIST_KEYWORD:"GET_LIST_KEYWORD",GET_LIST_KEYWORD_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_KEYWORD_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_KEYWORD_ERROR:"GET_LIST_KEYWORD_ERROR",GET_DETAIL:"GET_DETAIL",GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS:"GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS",GET_DETAIL_ERROR:"GET_DETAIL_ERROR"};Object.keys(CategoryActionTypes).forEach(function(key){CategoryActionTypes[key]="CATEGORY_".concat(CategoryActionTypes[key]);});/**
 * get_list
 **/var onGetList=function onGetList(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST,payload:payload};};var onGetListSuccess=function onGetListSuccess(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetListError=function onGetListError(error){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST_ERROR,payload:error};};var onGetAccessory=function onGetAccessory(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY,payload:payload};};var onGetAccessorySuccess=function onGetAccessorySuccess(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetAccessoryError=function onGetAccessoryError(error){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR,payload:error};};var onGetListKeyword=function onGetListKeyword(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST_KEYWORD,payload:payload};};var onGetListKeywordSuccess=function onGetListKeywordSuccess(payload){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST_KEYWORD_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetListKeywordError=function onGetListKeywordError(error){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_LIST_KEYWORD_ERROR,payload:error};};/**
 *
 * @param String id
 */var onGetDetail=function onGetDetail(id){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_DETAIL,id:id};};var onGetDetailSuccess=function onGetDetailSuccess(detail){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onGetDetailError=function onGetDetailError(error){return{type:CategoryActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_ERROR,payload:error};};var CategoryActions={onGetList:onGetList,onGetListSuccess:onGetListSuccess,onGetListError:onGetListError,onGetAccessory:onGetAccessory,onGetAccessorySuccess:onGetAccessorySuccess,onGetAccessoryError:onGetAccessoryError,onGetListKeyword:onGetListKeyword,onGetListKeywordSuccess:onGetListKeywordSuccess,onGetListKeywordError:onGetListKeywordError,onGetDetail:onGetDetail,onGetDetailSuccess:onGetDetailSuccess,onGetDetailError:onGetDetailError};export default CategoryActions;
